statements: SELECT * FROM travel_data;
SELECT trip_id, customer_id, trip_date, destination, trip_cost FROM travel_data;
SELECT customer_id, destination, trip_cost FROM travel_data WHERE trip_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM travel_data WHERE trip_cost > 500.00;
SELECT trip_id, destination FROM travel_data WHERE customer_id = '350e776e-9165-4d70-aee0-6390f5f0bc40';
SELECT * FROM travel_data WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT trip_id, customer_id, trip_date, destination FROM travel_data WHERE destination = 'Paris' ORDER BY trip_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(trip_cost) AS avg_cost FROM travel_data;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(trip_id) AS trip_count FROM travel_data GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY trip_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM travel_data WHERE trip_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY trip_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM travel_records;
SELECT travel_id, destination, travel_date FROM travel_records WHERE destination = 'Paris';
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM customer_info WHERE age > 30;
SELECT destination, distance_traveled FROM travel_records ORDER BY distance_traveled DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age, gender, policy_type FROM customer_info WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM travel_records WHERE travel_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, gender FROM customer_info WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customer_info WHERE gender = 'Male' AND policy_type = 'Gold' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT destination, travel_date FROM travel_records WHERE distance_traveled > 500 ORDER BY travel_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender, policy_type FROM customer_info ci INNER JOIN travel_records tr ON ci.customer_id = tr.customer_id WHERE tr.distance_traveled < 300 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Travelers;
SELECT traveler_id, traveler_name, traveler_age FROM Travelers ORDER BY traveler_age DESC;
SELECT traveler_name, traveler_country FROM Travelers WHERE traveler_country='USA';
SELECT trip_destination, trip_start_date, trip_end_date FROM Trips WHERE trip_cost > 1000;
SELECT offer_name, offer_coverage, offer_discount FROM InsuranceOffers ORDER BY offer_discount ASC;
SELECT * FROM Travelers;
SELECT traveler_name, traveler_age, traveler_country FROM Travelers ORDER BY traveler_name ASC;
SELECT trip_destination, trip_duration, trip_cost FROM Trips WHERE trip_cost > 1000 ORDER BY trip_cost DESC;
SELECT traveler_name, trip_destination, trip_start_date, trip_end_date FROM Travelers JOIN Trips ON Travelers.traveler_id = Trips.traveler_id;

SELECT traveler_name, offer_name, offer_coverage, offer_discount FROM Travelers JOIN InsuranceOffers ON Travelers.traveler_id = InsuranceOffers.offer_id WHERE InsuranceOffers.offer_discount > 10 ORDER BY InsuranceOffers.offer_discount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Travel_Insurance_Customers LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM Travel_Insurance_Customers ORDER BY customer_age DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_email FROM Travel_Insurance_Customers WHERE customer_gender='Female'
SELECT * FROM Travel_Destinations WHERE destination_rating > 4
SELECT destination_name, destination_country, destination_rating FROM Travel_Destinations ORDER BY destination_rating DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Travel_Insurance_Customers WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Travel_Insurance_Customers WHERE customer_gender='Female' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, policy_price FROM Travel_Insurance_Policies WHERE policy_price BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT * FROM Travel_Insurance_Claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000 AND claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT customer_name, customer_age, destination_name, destination_country FROM Travel_Insurance_Customers JOIN Travel_Destinations ON customer_id = destination_id WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY customer_name ASC, destination_name;
SELECT record_id, travel_date, source_location, destination_location, travel_distance FROM travel_records;
SELECT traveler_id, traveler_name, traveler_age, traveler_email, traveler_phone FROM traveler_info;
SELECT destination_id, destination_name, region, rating, num_visits FROM popular_destinations ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT offer_id, offer_type, coverage_details, premium_amount, validity_period FROM insurance_offers WHERE premium_amount < 100;
SELECT feedback_id, traveler_id, feedback_message, rating, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM travel_records WHERE traveler_id = 1234;
SELECT traveler_name, traveler_age, traveler_email FROM traveler_info WHERE traveler_id = 5678;
SELECT destination_name, rating, num_visits FROM popular_destinations WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT offer_type, coverage_details, premium_amount FROM insurance_offers WHERE validity_period > 6;
SELECT traveler_id, feedback_message, rating, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating < 3;
